attributes.action: Make it Mandatory for All Police forces throughout England & Wales to Uphold Hate Crime laws.
attributes.additional_details:
There are vast inconsistencies in the way police forces uphold the Hate crimes laws.

We ask that ALL police forces uphold the complete interpenetrating of what is Hate crime and not minimize this standard.
We further ask that All police forces throughout England & Wales strictly abide by the laws governing hate crimes. and use their authority to protect more fully Victims of Hate crimes.
